divs: sighting detailsapproximately 12:15 am my son spotted the large low flying glowing object coming from the chimney rocks area in hollidaysburg, pa. i video taped the entire event. i was slow low and magnificent, no noise at all from the craft. the most spectacular siting ever. it was flying east to west. i uploaded the video to youtube http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=c8zj3jy74tc
